block.name: Message Debug++
block.doc:
Provides Message printing to STDOUT for debug purposes.
3 ports are provided, each with different functionality. - print - simply renders the PMT using pmt::write_string() to STDOUT - store - stores the PMT in an internal vector for later retrival - print_pdu - expects the incoming message to be a PMT pair of meta data and data - utilizes pmt::write_string for meta data portion - expects the data portion to be a u8vector, if not, the data portion won't be rendered - prints out data portion as a hex dump
